question: Is it free to use?
answer: Yes. It is absolutely free to use.

question: Does it save our data?
answer: No, this platform is only made for entertainment purposes, and it does not store any user data.

question: Did you use a third-party library for this?
answer: No, we built everything from scratch and listed all the libraries used below.

question: What packages were used in the website building process?
answer:
These are the packages:
  • Next.js
  • React Hook Form
  • Axios
  • MongoDB and Mongoose
  • Tailwind CSS
  • Next Auth

question: How secure is my data on this platform?
answer: Your data is safe with us! We prioritize user privacy and do not store any personal information.

question: Can I report inappropriate messages?
answer: Yes, you can report any inappropriate messages through the designated reporting feature on the platform. or email us on code.udesh@gmail.com

question: Is there a mobile app version?
answer: Currently, there is no mobile app, but the website is fully responsive and can be accessed on mobile devices.

question: How can I contact support?
answer: You can contact support via our contact page or by emailing code.udesh@gmail.com
